div.p: Apple’s Silicon Engineering Group is looking for an energetic, highly motivated documentation tools developer to support a variety of key internal projects.

ul.li: 4+ years experience implementing/maintaining XML-based documentation toolchain.
Doctools test environments and release cycles.
4+ years programming/tools experience with many of the following:
Expert attention to detail with strong organizational skills.

div.p:
•The job involves working with technical writers supporting and engineers designing chips at the core of future Apple products, to:
•Streamline documentation generation and improve content quality of the technical specifications used by the internal hardware and software teams •Implement and maintain XML-based documentation toolchain • Work on processes/tools to integrate documentation with design/test benches/modeling •Provide toolchain training and support •Document toolchain workflows and processes
•This person is expected to leverage experience and good judgment to continuously drive documentation and process improvement across multiple, simultaneous projects and systems.
•BS/BA Degree in Engineering or Computer Science preferred; related degree or work experience considered
Open to Austin, TX or Cupertino, CA locations. 5% travel
